post_title: For Sale – Polar Bear Cobb Bat Off, Johnson Hands at Chest
post_content:
Hello – First time I've posted something for sale on here in a looooong time. Am selling these two PSA-graded cards and will be posting more T206, T205 and ‘33 Goudey HOFers and commons in the other BST forums in the coming days.

Prices include shipping. Prefer Paypal FF.  

T206 Ty Cobb (Polar Bear) Bat off Shoulder – PSA 1 – $2950 (SOLD)
(Has a diagonal crease across the bottom part of the card)

T206 Walter Johnson (Polar Bear) Hands at Chest – PSA 1.5 – $950 (SOLD)
(Centering is nice on the front, off left-to-right on the back)

PM or text (6786437765) for questions or additional pics.

Thanks!
Brad
